itags: Marketplace Morning Report for Tuesday, March 19, 2013
description: The government in Cyprus is scheduled to vote on a controversial tax on bank deposits later today. Could the measure lead to a run on Cypriot banks? The travel industry is up and so are luggage sellers. And shares of yoga apparel maker Lululemon are down after the company announced some of its pants are see-through.
byline: David Weinberg, Adam Allington, David Gura, Jeremy Hobson, Sabri Ben-Achour, David Brancaccio, Nigel Cassidy and Katie Long
title: Marketplace Morning Report for Tuesday, March 19, 2013
teaser: The government in Cyprus is scheduled to vote on a controversial tax on bank deposits later today. Could the measure lead to a run on Cypriot banks? The travel industry is up and so are luggage sellers. And shares of yoga apparel maker Lululemon are down after the company announced some of its pants are see-through.
